articles.title: FM Spokesman on U.S. Announcement of Suspension of Food Aid to DPRK
articles.content:
FM Spokesman on U.S. Announcement of Suspension of Food Aid to DPRK
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Saturday as regards the U.S. moves to exploit the DPRK's planned launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-3 for meeting its sinister political and military purposes:
					The U.S. overreaction to the DPRK's plan to launch scientific and technological satellite for peaceful purposes has gone beyond the limit.
					
					The U.S. has so far insisted that it does not relate humanitarian issue with the political issue. But it responded to the DPRK's planned satellite launch with the announcement to stop following through on its commitment to food aid. This would be a regrettable act of scrapping the DPRK-U.S. agreement in its entirety as it is a violation of the core articles of the February 29 DPRK-U.S. agreement.
					
					The DPRK extended invitation to satellite experts to visit the launching station to show the sincerity of the DPRK as regards the peaceful satellite launch in a transparent manner. But the U.S. clarified that it would not send its experts and also forced other countries not to send one.
					
					This stands in sharp contrast to its previous insistence that the DPRK should accept inspectors of the International Atomic Energy Agency to ensure the transparency of its nuclear activities.
					
					What the U.S. fears is the objective confirmation of the peaceful nature of the DPRK's satellite launch.
					
					It has its own political and military objective in describing the DPRK's satellite launch as a long-range missile launch.
					
					By describing the DPRK's "long-range missile capabilities" as a "threat to the U.S. mainland", the U.S. seeks to justify its missile defense system, which is opposed by all the countries in Northeast Asia, and use it as a pretext for pressing forward the MD.
					
					The path chosen by the U.S. would harass peace and stability in Northeast Asia including the Korean Peninsula and spark off fresh cold war.
					
					The DPRK has not yet reached such a point as to discuss the severity and gravity of the consequences to be entailed by the U.S. wrong option.
					
					It just hopes that the U.S. would courageously accept peaceful satellite launch by a sovereign state, though belatedly, and prove in practice its words that it has no hostility toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Meetings Held to Elect Delegates to WPK Conference
articles.content:
Meetings Held to Elect Delegates to WPK Conference
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Meetings of Jagang, South Hwanghae, North Phyongan and Kangwon provinces and Rason City were held to elect delegates to the Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					Present there were delegates elected at the party organizations of cities and counties in the provinces and those performing the same function as theirs' and the party organizations of the provincial institutions.
					
					The delegates paid silent tribute to leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					The meetings discussed the election of delegates to the WPK Conference.
					
					Addresses on electing the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the WPK and the Korean people, as a delegate to the WPK Conference were made at the meetings.
					
					The addresses said that Kim Jong Il defended the socialist country and laid the foundation for the happy life of the Korean people while hewing the untrodden difficult path in the van with his iron will and superhuman energy.
					
					Kim Jong Un is the supreme leader of the WPK and the Korean people who is leading to victory the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving nation which was pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and advanced by Kim Jong Il, the addresses noted, adding that the ideological and theoretical guidelines have been provided to boundlessly glorify the Juche idea and the Songun idea and the day of victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving nation is coming near thanks to the energetic ideological and theoretical activities and tested leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					The addresses praised him as the great statesman who is wisely leading the revolution and construction as a whole with his tested leadership and the general of Mt. Paektu style who is making the DPRK shed its rays as a military power, possessed of the distinguished quality and trait and organizational ability that no one can match. 
					
					The addresses courteously proposed to elect him as a delegate to the WPK Conference, representing the unanimous will and desire of all the party members and other people in the provinces and the city.
					
					At the meetings speakers fully supported and approved the proposal on electing him as a delegate to the WPK Conference.
					
					The meetings unanimously adopted decisions on electing him as a delegate to the WPK Conference.
					
					The meetings elected delegates to the WPK Conference.

articles.title: New Korean Feature Film Produced
articles.content:
New Korean Feature Film Produced
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The April 25 Film Studio produced feature film "Member of Explosives Removal Team".
					The film based on an actual story deals with a member of explosives clearing team who laid down his life in removing an unexploded shell that the U.S. imperialist aggressors dropped on the land of the country during the past Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					The film teaches truth that people living in the era of Songun find their life's worth and happiness in devotedly defending the headquarters of the revolution.

articles.title: "Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (16)
articles.content:
"Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (16)
Kim Il Sung Initiates Chollima Movement
					
					Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the Korean people fulfilled the three-year plan for postwar rehabilitation in two years and eight months and began carrying on the five-year plan in Juche 46 (1957).
					
					The five-year plan envisaged the building of foundations of socialism and the development of the DPRK, an agriculture state, into a socialist industry-agriculture state.
					
					At the plenary meeting of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea held in December 1956, the President advanced a slogan "Let us produce more, practice economy, and overfulfil the five-year plan ahead of schedule!", which appealed to all party members and other working people to tap all the internal reserves and raise the rate of operation of equipment to the maximum.
					
					Soon after the meeting, he dispatched senior officials of the party and government to factories and farms throughout the country.
					
					Early on the morning of December 28 that year, he visited the then Kangson Steel Plant to discuss increasing steel output, urgently needed for the nation's economy.
					
					He convened there a consultative meeting of the plant's officials and frontrunner workers. He informed them of the basic agenda discussed at the December plenary meeting, details of the five-year plan, internal and external situation and the bottlenecks in topping the next year's economic quota. 
					
					He said the Party was pinning hope on the working class, the driving forces of the revolution, stressing the nation's economy can be put on its track only when they turn out 10 000 more tonnes of steel. 
					
					In response to his call, its workers produced 120 000 tonnes of billets in a blooming mill with an annual capacity of 60 000 tonnes, overriding passivism, conservatism and mysticism about technology, thus sparking off the Chollima Movement.
					
					Chollima, which means a horse galloping 400 km a day, symbolically contains the revolutionary mettle of the Korean people pushing ahead with socialist construction at the highest speed. 
					
					The President also went to the then Hwanghae Iron Works, Hungnam and Sinpho areas, Mundok and Sukchon counties and other factories, farms and fishing grounds across the country, to encourage all the people to turn out in the Chollima movement.
					
					The movement resulted in world-startling innovations in all fields of socialist construction.
					
					The then Kim Chaek Iron Works produced 270 000 tonnes of pig iron out of the blast furnace with an annual capacity of 190 000 tonnes, while the then Hwanghae Iron Works erected a large-sized blast furnace in less than a year.
					
					The machine-building industry succeeded in manufacturing a tractor in 30 days, a lorry in 40 days, an 8-meter turning lathe, a 3 000-tonne press, an excavator, a large-sized water pump, a bulldozer and many other modern machines and equipment by its own efforts.
					
					More than 13 000 machine tools were manufactured in a year.
					
					Some 9 900 irrigation facilities were installed to supply water to more than 377 000 hectares of farmland.
					
					Jangjingang Power Station was rehabilitated and large and minor power stations, including Jangjagang Power Station were built.
					
					The tasks to hit the goal of gross industrial output value for the 5-year plan were carried out in two and a half years and the quota for major industrial products fulfilled or overfulfilled on all indices of products in four years.
					
					As a result, the country could have solid foundations for socialism and the DPRK developed into a socialist industry-agriculture state with self-supporting national economy.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Decries Collusion between Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Decries Collusion between Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- There is a sign of Lee Myung Bak getting aligned with Park Geun Hye within the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea ahead of the "general election".
					Park has so far pointed an accusing finger at pro-Lee faction, calling for getting "alienated" from Lee. But now she flatters, saying "she has never ignored pro-Lee faction". Traitor Lee, too, is making a show of himself, praising Park as "one of a few promising politicians" in south Korea.
					
					In the past Lee and Park had been at odds, talking about seceding from the party and forming a new party. These philistines have made a U-turn in their attitudes, sparking public derision.
					
					The public is fed up of sordid political burlesque that comes on the stage whenever election season draws on.
					
					The collusion between Lee and Park is just a dirty politically-and strategically-motivated collusion between criminals forsaken by the society and people.
					
					It is well known that during his tenure of office the Lee group left the whole of the south Korean society to the tender mercy of outsiders through unpopular rule and arbitrary practices, thereby pushing people into destitution and plunging the north-south ties into complete deadlock.
					
					A series of corruption cases is now strangling Lee.
					
					Only stern judgment by history and nation awaits the traitor for his thrice-cursed crimes. This guy who is more dead than alive is suffering from fear and nightmare of getting beaten in a back street.
					
					So, he decided to flatter Park to prolong his dirty remaining days after his retirement from office.
					
					Park's group, renowned for narrowness and caprice, experienced a setback ahead of the "general election" with the wholesale secession of pro-Lee faction members from the "Saenuri Party." Calculating that this would be unfavorable for winning in the "presidential election" due in December, to say nothing of the "general election," Park had no choice but to show a wildcat's smile on her face that always remained frowned with depression and worry.
					
					Conspiracy of criminals is bound to bring forth bigger crime and the people to suffer a lot from it.
					
					This is the reason that broad segments of south Koreans are becoming increasingly vocal in censuring the "Saenuri Party."

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Lashes at Japanese Prime Minister's Conception of History
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Lashes at Japanese Prime Minister's Conception of History
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Japanese prime ministers' conception of history negating the past is sparking off criticism among international community.
					Speaking at the meeting of the Budget Committee of the House of Councillors of Japan Monday, he talked nonsense that the expression of "sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese army" is not correct.
					
					This is an arrogant act of negating the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese army which the international community has so far branded as a hideous human rights abuse. This, at the same time, glaringly shows the negative approach taken by Japan towards the issue of reflecting on its past crimes.
					
					The above-said crime is a typical example of state-sponsored violence against women.
					
					This was the worst unethical crime committed by the Japanese imperialists in an organized and institutional manner by use of government and military powers, pursuant to their state policy enforced during their war of continental invasion. 
					
					They kidnapped and took away 200 000 Korean women and forced them into "sexual slavery" for the aggressor forces in battle fields and massacred them to cover up their despicable atrocities.
					
					Japan was the only country in the world that committed group sexual slavery directly sponsored and enforced by the government and military.
					
					However, Japan is working hard to evade state responsibility for the said crime, describing it as "deeds of individual prostitutes." It went the lengths of hypocritically claiming that the victims "volunteered to provide sex to earn money." There are countless examples of reckless remarks made by government officials of Japan in this regard. Some of them described the history of sexual slavery as that of "lavatory," rubbing salt into the wounds of the victims and it is not bad to see fewer descriptions of comfort women in textbooks.
					
					Japan is persistently negating its crime-woven history in a bid to go without redeeming its crime-woven past. 
					
					Japan's attitude toward its past crimes amounts to an act of blatantly challenging the demand of the international community for Japan's settlement of its crime-woven history and an illegal act of adding to crimes.
					
					Japan can never shirk its responsibility for mocking at humankind.
					
					Any delay in Japan's redemption of its past would only add to its crimes and worsen its political position.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates a bylined article to the 30th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea".
					The work, published on March 31, 1982, comprehensively deals with the philosophical and socio-historical principles of the Juche idea and its guiding principles.
					
					The publication of the work helped glorify the ideological and theoretical feats of President Kim Il Sung who founded the Juche idea and provided important guidelines for the Korean people and the world progressives to dynamically advance along the road of Juche, the article says, and goes on:
					
					After publishing the work, Kim Jong Il developed into a new higher stage the drive to arm the Korean people with the Juche idea and model the whole society on it.
					
					The undying feat performed by him by glorifying the Juche idea through generations finds its manifestation in that he gave scientific answers to theoretical and practical matters that newly arose in accomplishing the socialist cause.
					
					His energetic ideological and theoretical activities, which stood out for their originality, profundity and contents in accordance with the requirements of the times, provided unique strategies and tactics of the Songun revolution including the idea on the driving force of the revolution. They also helped the Korean revolution make steady victorious progress.
					
					He directed utmost efforts to training all people as ardent adherents to the Juche idea and its faithful implementers, and embodying it to all fabrics of social life.
					
					During the whole period of guiding the Korean revolution, he led the army and people of the DPRK to win victory after another under the uplifted banner of Juche, the banner of Songun.
					
					Their triumph in defending socialism and big innovation and leaping progress in building a thriving nation are a striking demonstration of vitality and might of the Juche idea.
					
					Kim Jong Il performed revolutionary exploits by pursuing the unique Songun politics based on the Juche idea and brought about brilliant achievements of the Juche idea while making the forced march of the highest intensity. This will shine for all ages.

articles.title: Ensuring Peace on Korean Peninsula Is Priority Task: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Ensuring Peace on Korean Peninsula Is Priority Task: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Peace and security in Asia-Pacific are essential for global peace and security.
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a by-lined article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					Peace and security in the Asia Pacific pose themselves as a more serious issue on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The madcap war exercises and espionage were conducted in south Korea against the backdrop of the U.S. announcement of its new defense strategy with main emphasis on Asia-Pacific. This proved that they were mainly targeted against the DPRK and its neighboring countries.
					
					They, at the same time, proved once again that Northeast Asia is a dangerous hotbed of a new world war.
					
					Keeping pace with the U.S. strategy for world supremacy, the Japanese reactionaries are working hard to realize their wild ambition for overseas expansion. This has increased the threat to peace and security in Asia-Pacific and the rest of the world.
					
					They have designated the DPRK as the primary target of their overseas aggression.
					
					They are offering their islands as transit and logistic bases for the joint military exercises staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces in south Korea.
					
					No sooner had the DPRK announced its plan for launching a satellite than the anti-DPRK forces in Japan joined the U.S. in crying out for international pressure on it.
					
					Such reckless acts of those forces resulted in escalating the tension on the peninsula and, furthermore, in Northeast Asia.
					
					It is an urgent task of the times whose fulfillment brooks no further delay to ensure peace and security on the peninsula.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on S. Korean Authorities' Unpopular Economic Policy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on S. Korean Authorities' Unpopular Economic Policy
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a by-lined article discloses the deceptive nature of traitor Lee Myung Bak who took office with a commitment to "economic recovery".
					The Lee Myung Bak group's economic policy is nothing but the one of treachery as it has left the south Korean economy to the tender mercy of outside forces lock, stock and barrel, the article says, and goes on:
					
					Traitor Lee who has neither clear political philosophy nor his own view accepted U.S.-style "neo-liberalism", talking about what he called "pragmatism".
					
					Fully taken to sycophancy towards the U.S., Lee has made the south Korean economy increasingly dependent on the U.S.
					
					His policy of "economic recovery" ended up ruining economy as it caused bankruptcy of finance, monetary confusion and sky-rocketing commodity prices.
					
					The south Korean ruling forces offered big businesses all kinds of privileges such as the easing of regulations and tax reduction and exemption while turning their faces away from the daily deteriorating people's living.
					
					The pro-big business policy pursued by Lee since he came to power caused small and medium enterprises which account for the majority of all enterprises in south Korea go bankrupt en masse, rapidly increasing the number of unemployed people.
					
					The south Korean conservative authorities' above-said economic policy has thrown the people into dire destitution.
					
					The south Korean people keenly realized over the last four years how unpopular Lee's economic policy is.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Plan to Stage Field Mobile Exercise
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Plan to Stage Field Mobile Exercise
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The 8th Division of the south Korean puppet army plans to stage field mobile exercise in the areas of Phochon, Kyonggi Province and Cholwon, south Korean Kangwon Province from April 2 to 6, south Korean Yonhap News reported.
					Timed to coincide with this, the 25th Division of the puppet army is set to stage field tactical exercise in the areas of Phaju, Yangju and Ryonchon in Kyonggi Province.
					
					Meanwhile, the artillery forces of the 1st Corps of the puppet army waged large-scale shelling drill in Phaju, Kyonggi Province on March 22 as part of the war rehearsals for amounting surprise preemptive attacks on the DPRK.
					
					The unprecedented war maneuvers in the forefront areas of south Korea prove that the ambition of the south Korean warmongers for invading the north has reached a practical phase.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Story about "Instability of North's System" Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities′ Story about "Instability of North′s System" Slammed
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group is busy floating the story about "instability of the north's system". The story is nothing but a version of the fiction about the "change of system".
					Such rubbish as "period of power transition" and "instability of system" can never work in the DPRK where the army and the people are dynamically advancing, rallied close around the supreme leader, Minju Joson Saturday says in a bylined commentary.
					
					It goes on:
					
					"Instability of system" is being created in south Korea.
					
					Even at this hour people from all walks of life are courageously turning out in the actions against Lee Myung Bak in south Korea. To make matters worse, a factional strife is getting fierce within the group of traitors in the run-up to the "National Assembly" election.
					
					This group, thrown into a predicament at home and abroad, is impudent enough to talk about " instability of system," distorting and slandering the reality of the DPRK demonstrating before the whole world the single-minded unity more powerful than a nuclear bomb. This is no more than a political caricature.
					
					The aim sought by the group in floating the story about "instability of north's system" is to mislead the public opinion in a bid to divert elsewhere the people's criticism of it and tide over the ruling crisis and escalate the confrontation with compatriots.
					
					As long as the group of traitors hell-bent on the confrontation between the two differing systems is allowed to stay in power, the nation can never escape from misfortune. As a rabid dog should be beaten to death with a stick, the group of traitors should be wiped out as it is engrossed in acts going against the people's mindset. This is the will of all the Koreans.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Suppressing Progressive Forces
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Suppressing Progressive Forces
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is busy floating a ridiculous story about "the north wind" in an effort to turn the situation before the election favorable to it and thus prolong its remaining days. 
					The group is again touting the trite "theory of coloring," labeling the progressive forces calling for independence, democracy, improved north-south relations and reunification "pro-north left-wing forces" and "followers of the north". It is, at the same time, fabricating "spy-ring cases" one after another in a bid to intensify the crackdown on them. 
					
					The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in its information bulletin No. 994 on Saturday notes that these actions of the group are nothing but the last-ditch efforts of those on the verge of ruin, completely forsaken by the people for its sycophancy towards the U.S., unpopular rule and policy of confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					It goes on:
					
					The group's acts are also indicative of their sinister intentions to calm down the strong "call for punishing the government," the main slogan put up by the forces advocating democratic reforms and the people in the run-up to the general election. They are also aimed at diverting elsewhere the people's mind-set and the public attention and prolonging the regime of pro-U.S. elements and quislings by rallying ultra-right conservative forces.
					
					The group's noisier trumpeting about "the north wind" and "theory of coloring," the trite methods it employed whenever elections drew on, would only bring to light its  true colors as a group of traitors and anti-reunification maniacs hell-bent on confrontation with fellow countrymen and precipitate its miserable end.

articles.title: Probe into Truth behind Cheonan Sinking Called for
articles.content:
Probe into Truth behind Cheonan Sinking Called for
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A south Korean internet newspaper carried an article contributed by Ri Sung Hon, professor of physics in Virginia College of the U.S. on Mar. 28 on the lapse of two years since the "Cheonan" warship case.
					The article said the south Korean authorities egged the joint investigation team on to produce torpedo "No. 1" which was no more than scrap iron as powerful evidence in a bid to pass the buck for the case to the north and escalate confrontation. 
					
					The torpedo "No. 1", however, was just a fabrication whose falsity was proven by several experts, the article noted, and went on:
					
					The "government" and conservative media of south Korea still echo the same allegation they used to make two years ago.
					
					What is deplorable is that logical discussion is impossible in south Korea and the "government" and conservative forces still go on the rampage, labeling those who raise reasonable questions as leftist forces.
					
					It is necessary to probe who ordered to cook up the evidence and who made a false conclusion.

articles.title: DPRK's Decision Will Depend on U.S. Attitude: Russian
articles.content:
DPRK's Decision Will Depend on U.S. Attitude: Russian
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Badzhanov, president of Diplomatic Academy under the Foreign Ministry of Russia, issued a commentary over the serious situation now prevailing in the Korean Peninsula, according to ITAR-TASS on March 28.
					Future decisions to be made by the new leader of the DPRK will depend on the U.S. acts, the commentary said, and went on:
					
					Leader Kim Jong Un is a simple and sociable young man.
					
					He resembles President Kim Il Sung in many aspects as he is well versed in information technology, economy, history and all other fields.
					
					The U.S. has strained its nerves when other countries had access to a few missiles. It has pursued vicious hostile policy toward the DPRK for more than half a century, while getting itself fully equipped with huge missiles, planes, etc.
					
					The DPRK could neither overlook nor tolerate the U.S. gangster-like act.
					
					It was assured time and again that only nuclear weapons could curb the U.S. invasion.
					
					Nuclear dismantlement is possible only when one is absolutely sure of one's own security.
					
					To this end, the U.S. should start the work of recognizing the DPRK in a diplomatic way.
					
					It should discard the stand of regarding diplomatic acknowledgement as a great concession or as a show of good faith.
					
					The only way for it is to expand relations with the DPRK so as to lead it to dismantle nukes.
					
					The ball is in the U.S. court.

articles.title: DPRK Planned Launch of Satellite Supported
articles.content:
DPRK Planned Launch of Satellite Supported
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association on Monday released a statement to support the DPRK planned launch of satellite.
					The DPRK has a legitimate right to launch satellites for peaceful purposes, the statement said, and continued:
					
					The DPRK has made positive efforts to realize the nuclear disarmament in the whole of Korea through dialogue and ensure peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The association congratulates the Koreans on manufacturing satellite Kwangmyongsong-3 with the use of cutting edge science and technology.
					
					We urge the western countries to acknowledge the DPRK's rights to the development of the space science and technology for peaceful purposes, and halt their far-fetched accusation.
					
					Basanta Kumar Shrestha, chairman of the International Committee for the Study of Songun Politics for Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Nepal, and its vice-chairman in a joint statement on Mar. 25 expressed worries about the vicious provocations by some western forces against the DPRK's plan for peaceful and legitimate satellite launch.
					
					They voiced their conviction that the positive efforts of the DPRK to launch a satellite would contribute to boosting the general development ability of the country.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Switzerland
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Switzerland
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" was brought out in pamphlet by the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Mar. 25.
					The work, published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993), comprehensively deals with the ways for achieving the great unity of the whole Korean nation. They include the issue of founding a unified state through the great unity of the whole nation, the issue of achieving unity based on patriotism and the spirit of national independence and the issue of achieving unity on the principle of promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests. Also expounded in the work are the issue of ending all political disputes that foment division and confrontation between fellow countrymen and for the north and the south to believe in each other and unite and the issue for the whole nation to join hands on the road for national reunification irrespective of differing idea and ism.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Switzerland, Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Switzerland, Brazil
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Switzerland and Brazil posted special write-ups on the Internet homepage on Mar. 16 and 20 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					The Switzerland-Korea Committee in the article titled "100-Year History of Kim Il Sung's Korea" said the Day of the Sun this year will be a significant day marking the centenary of the birth of Kim Il Sung, the greatest man the Korean people acclaimed for the first time in the nation's history spanning 5 000 years.
					
					The Korean people and the progressive humankind boundlessly admire him as the father of the nation and the sun of Juche, the article said.
					
					It introduced in detail that he founded the Juche idea and Songun idea, won national liberation and led to victory the building of a new country, the Fatherland Liberation War, post-war rehabilitation and socialist construction.
					
					The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted a similar article.
					
					The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea dealt with undying feats by the President, who devoted his all to prosperity of the country and well-being of his people all his life, in an article titled "The Centenary of the Birth of President Kim Il Sung." 
					
					He enjoyed undisputed authority in the world political arena and was revered by the progressive humankind for his great contribution to global independence, the article said, and continued:
					
					The progressives of the world have presented to him plenty of orders, medals, honorary titles and gifts not only during his lifetime but also after his death.
					
					The International Kim Il Sung Prize has been instituted and streets, organizations and institutions named after him are on the increase in the world.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Is Always Alive in Hearts of Mankind: Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Is Always Alive in Hearts of Mankind: Foreign Papers
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups on the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					The Russian paper Bremya Perementeve on March 21 carried an article titled "Great man in the century" with the portrait of a smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					He is always alive in the hearts of mankind as a peerlessly great man who founded the Juche idea, it said, and went on:
					
					He liberated Korea from the colonial yoke of Japanese imperialism with the Juche idea as the guidelines.
					
					The Juche idea has attracted progressives for its originality, truth and scientific accuracy and there appeared in the world many Juche idea study organizations.
					
					He extensively authored works all his life, giving the principled exposition to the major international issues. He met with a total of over 70 000 foreigners during his life.
					
					The Bangladeshi paper Citizen on March 26 edited articles titled "A great man in the century", "President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, was the people's leader", "Statesman who pursued the policy of loving care for man" and "Might of Korea".
					
					He devoted his all to the people's happiness all his life, the paper said.
					
					The Cambodian paper Kmae Amata on March 26 in an article said that he enjoyed undisputed authority in the world political community and received boundless reverence from progressive mankind.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated Abroad
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries from March 23 to 25 to commemorate the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					They included meetings, book and photo exhibitions, film shows and lectures in Myanmar, Switzerland, Guinea and Ukraine.
					
					Displayed in the venues of the exhibitions were books and photos of the brilliant revolutionary careers and exploits of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					Win Maung Kyaw, executive member of the Nay Pyi Taw Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar, said in his speech that it is a noble duty of the world progressive people to commemorate the centenary of the birth of the President with splendor as a great political festival common to humankind.
					
					Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, noted that upcoming events including the Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea and the launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-3 would brilliantly decorate the centenary of the birth of the President and demonstrate the might and dignity of the DPRK to the world.
					
					Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, in a lecture titled "Great Man Kim Il Sung" praised the President as an outstanding leader who wisely led global independence.
					
					Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, in a lecture titled "Life of Comrade Kim Il Sung who Adhered to the Motto of Believing in the People as in Heaven" praised the undying exploits the President performed for the Korean revolution and human cause of independence.
					
					A message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event in Switzerland.

articles.title: 100th Day of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
articles.content:
100th Day of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Personages of political parties, social organizations, the Juche idea study groups, organizations for friendship and solidarity with Korean people and institutions in many countries visited the DPRK missions in their countries on Mar. 25, the 100th day of the demise of leader Kim Jong Il. They included China, Russia, Mongolia, India, Nepal, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Egypt, Kuwait, Democratic Congo, Nigeria, Guinea, Bulgaria, Germany, UK, Italy, Austria, Switzerland, Sweden, Mexico and Peru. The director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea also paid a visit to the DPRK mission on the occasion.
					They laid wreaths, floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of Kim Jong Il and paid silent tribute.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published In Italy, Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published In Italy, Egypt
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was published in booklet by the Print Paper Publishing House in Italy.
					The work, published on October 2, 1995, reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea that paved a new way for building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					It serves as a great program for party building and activities indicating the way to develop the party into Kim Il Sung's party forever.
					
					Meanwhile, his another work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was brought out in booklet by Nath Publishing House in Egypt.
					
					The work, published on August 4, 1997, deals with undying feats performed by Kim Il Sung for the cause of national reunification.
					
					In the work the three principles of national reunification, 10-point program of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federation Republic of Koryo are formulated as the three charters for national reunification and tasks and ways to realize national reunification based on them are clarified.

articles.title: Songun Politics Firmly Defends DPRK: Bangladeshi Politician
articles.content:
Songun Politics Firmly Defends DPRK: Bangladeshi Politician
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, and Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, released a joint statement on March 26 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					The Day of the Sun is a common holiday of not only the Korean people but the progressive peoples of the world, the statement said, and went on:
					
					Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea to clearly indicate the way to be followed by mankind, and realized the centuries-old desire of the Korean people to live in a new world free from all manners of exploitation and oppression.
					
					This instilled great confidence and courage into the world progressive peoples struggling to build a new society.
					
					The Songun politics that has been invariably carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un is firmly defending socialist Korea from the imperialists' moves to stifle it.
					
					We are firmly convinced that the army and the people of the DPRK will register greater achievements in their struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Russian Vice PM Warns of Adverse Effect of U.S. MD
articles.content:
Russian Vice PM Warns of Adverse Effect of U.S. MD
Moscow, March 30 (KCNA) -- Russian Vice Prime Minister Dmitri Rogozin warned that the recent U.S. deployment of missile defense system can spark an offensive arms race.
					Branding the U.S. plan to establish missile defense system as a product of political egoism and arbitrariness, he said beefing up defensive weapons would result in beefing up offensive weapons.
					
					Querying what the purpose of the U.S. establishment of huge military infrastructure is, he insisted the MD is not the best way for ensuring security.

articles.title: Hundreds Stage Anti-U.S. Rally in Islamabad
articles.content:
Hundreds Stage Anti-U.S. Rally in Islamabad
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Hundreds of people staged a rally outside the parliament house in Islamabad against the U.S. on March 28.
					They said that the whole Pakistani nation is against the U.S. drone attacks but the arrogant Americans have continued strikes which are killing innocent people. 
					
					They noted the U.S policy of "war against terrorism" has in fact promoted terrorism in Pakistan and the whole region, holding the U.S. responsible for the instability in the region.

articles.title: Palestinians Protest U.S. Top Court Ruling over Jerusalem-born Americans
articles.content:
Palestinians Protest U.S. Top Court Ruling over Jerusalem-born Americans
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Palestine Liberation Organization (PLO) on Wednesday protested a U.S. high court ruling allowing Americans born in Jerusalem to list Israel as their birthplace.
					"This is a dangerous, unprecedented decision," said Yasser Abed Rabbo, a member of the PLO's Executive Committee, in an interview with a news agency.
					
					"This will not change the reality of the international consensus that East Jerusalem is the capital of the forthcoming Palestinian state," he stressed.

articles.title: China Eyes Cooperation with Tajikistan and India
articles.content:
China Eyes Cooperation with Tajikistan and India
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of China and the People's Democratic Party of Tajikistan on Tuesday pledged to enhance exchanges and cooperation. 
					On Monday China favored greater military ties with India, saying such exchanges would help build more confidence and trust between the two countries.

articles.title: Ahmadinejad: Arrogant Powers Bent on Saving Zionist Regime
articles.content:
Ahmadinejad: Arrogant Powers Bent on Saving Zionist Regime
Tehran, March 30 (KCNA) -- President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad said on Tuesday that "today, it has become clear to all that the arrogant powers try to harm Iran, Syria and the resistance movement, trying to save the Zionist regime under the slogan of human rights and caring for freedom".
					He called for being always vigilant and strong against their plots.

articles.title: MINREX condena actitud de EE.UU. sobre lanzamiento de satelite
articles.content:
MINREX condena actitud de EE.UU. sobre lanzamiento de satelite
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que Estados Unidos intenta utilizar el tema de lanzamiento del satelite artificial coreano "Kwangmyongsong-3" en sus siniestros objetivos politico-militares, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 31 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC: 
					Sobrepasa el limite la reaccion excesiva de Estados Unidos al plan de nuestro pais de lanzar un satelite artificial cientifico-tecnico con fines pacificos. 
					
					Si bien preconizaba que no vincularia los problemas humanitarios con la politica, EE.UU. anuncio que suspenderia la implementacion de su compromiso a la asistencia alimentaria a nuestro pais debido al lanzamiento de satelite. 
					
					Esto significa la violacion del articulo principal del Acuerdo RPDC-EE.UU. alcanzado el 29 de febrero, siendo un acto muy lamentable que quebrara por completo ese documento. 
					
					Ademas, en cuanto a nuestra invitacion a los especialistas extranjeros para mostrar con transparencia la verdad del lanzamiento de satelite artificial pacifico, EE.UU. dijo que no enviaria a sus especialistas sino presiona a otros paises a hacer lo mismo. 
					
					Es una actitud contrastante a su anterior insistencia en que nuestro pais acepte a los inspectores de la Agencia Internacional de Energia Atomica para asegurar la transparencia de nuestras actividades nucleares. 
					
					EE.UU. tiene miedo a la confirmacion objetiva del caracter pacifico del lanzamiento de nuestro satelite. 
					
					Lo describe obstinadamente como el de misil balistico de largo alcance partiendo de su siniestro objetivo politico-militar.
					
					Al pregonar que la "capacidad de misiles de largo alcance" de la RPDC representa una "amenaza al territorio norteamericano", EE.UU. quiere procurarse  el pretexto de justificar e impulsar el establecimiento de su sistema antimisiles, rechazado por todos los paises del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					Lo que esta haciendo EE.UU. buscara la nueva guerra fria perturbando la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					No queremos discutir por ahora la gravedad de las consecuencias que provengan de la opcion erronea de EE.UU. 
					
					Esperamos que EE.UU. tenga el valor de reconocer el lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos por un Estado soberano y compruebe asi con accion su dicho de que no tiene la voluntad de hostilizar.

articles.title: Reuniones de delegados a la Conferencia del PTC
articles.content:
Reuniones de delegados a la Conferencia del PTC
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar las reuniones de delegados del Consejo de Ministros, el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los Ministerios del Ferrocarril y de Cultura para elegir a los delegados a la Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					A las ocasiones asistieron los delegados elegidos en las organizaciones del partido a todos niveles del Consejo de Ministros, el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los Ministerios del Ferrocarril y Cultura.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Los foros discutieron sobre la eleccion a los delegados a la Conferencia del PTC.
					
					En las reuniones, los discursos de propuesta para elegir al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un como  delegado a la Conferencia del PTC estuvieron a cargo del premier Choe Yong Rim, el jefe de la Direccion Politica del ESIPC Ri Pyong Sam, el jefe de la Direccion Politica del Ministerio de Ferrocarril Han Chang Nam y el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en el Ministerio de Cultura Ri Myong Mo.
					
					Los oradores recordaron que el Dirigente dedico hasta el ultimo momento de su vida todas las energias para la prosperidad de Corea de Kim Il Sung, la felicidad del pueblo y el avance victorioso de la causa de la independencia del mundo y subrayaron que sus hazanas revolucionarias brillaran de generacion en generacion.
					
					Senalaron que la eleccion del Maximo Dirigente como delegado a la Conferencia del PTC es la expresion de la absoluta confianza y la ferviente fidelidad de todos los militantes y trabajadores del Consejo de Ministros, el ESIPC, los Ministerios de Ferrocarril y de Cultura.
					
					Destacaron que siendo el mas intimo companero de armas y camarada revolucionario del Dirigente, el Maximo Dirigente estuvo siempre junto con el en el camino de la revolucion del Songun, vino apoyando fielmente su idea y direccion y abre una nueva era de la causa de eternidad del lider con la infinita fidelidad y noble obligacion moral hacia el.
					
					Las citadas reuniones propusieron cortesmente elegir al Maximo Dirigente como delegado a la Conferencia del PTC y los oradores apoyaron absolutamente susodichas propuestas.
					
					En las ocasiones fueron aprobadas por unanimidad tales resoluciones correspondientes.
					
					Acto seguido, fueron electos otros delegados a la Conferencia del PTC.

articles.title: Secretariado de CRPP publica la informacion no. 994
articles.content:
Secretariado de CRPP publica la informacion no. 994
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- En estos dias, las autoridades surcoreanas recurren al sucio complot de levantar la "oleada anti-Norte (de Corea)" para cambiar la desfavorable coyuntura de elecciones y mantener asi su precaria vida politica.
					Ellas volvieron a sacar la vieja "teoria de colores", segun la cual describe a las fuerzas progresistas partidarias de independencia, democracia, mejoramiento de las relaciones con el Norte y reunificacion como "fuerzas izquierdistas pro-Norte" y las "fuerzas seguidoras al Norte" y traman sucesivamente "caso de grupo de espias".
					
					En su informacion no. 944 publicada este sabado, el secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) denuncio que tales pasos no pasan de ser el ultimo coletazo de los que fueron abandonados por el pueblo debido al servilismo proyanqui, la infame politica antipopular y la conflictiva anti-RPDC, y prosiguio:
					
					Ademas, parten de vil intento de eliminar la "teoria de sentenciar al poder", consigna principal de las fuerzas democraticas y reformistas y los habitantes para las inminentes elecciones generales, distraer la atencion de la opinion publica y mantener el "poder" vendepatria y proyanqui agrupando a las fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas.  
					
					Cada vez que enfrentaban las elecciones, los titeres surcoreanos levantan la "oleada anti-Norte" volviendo a sacar la "teoria de colores".
					
					Pero, esto no tendra otro resultado que demostrar la asquerosa fachada de ellos como traidores sin parangon y opositores a la reunificacion, enfrascados en el enfrentamiento fratricida, y acelerar su autodestruccion.

articles.title: ACNC comenta connivencia entre Lee Myung Bak y Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
ACNC comenta connivencia entre Lee Myung Bak y Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- En visperas de las "elecciones generales" se desarrolla una campana de connivencia en el "Partido Saenuri" del Sur de Corea. 
					Park Geun-hye que acosaba a los compinches del traidor Lee Myung Bak cambio de repente su postura diciendo que "no excluye al circulo pro-Lee" y el traidor Lee tambien alaba a Park como "una de pocos politicos prometedores" en el Sur de Corea. 
					
					El cambio repentino de la postura de esos politiqueros que armaban alborotos con la retirada del partido, la fundacion de nuevo partido, etc., es una farsa politica que se tramaba siempre en visperas de "elecciones". 
					
					La poblacion surcoreana no expresa ni una sorpresa ni admiracion sino se burla de ese matrimonio politico de los culpables condenados por la sociedad y el pueblo. 
					
					Como esta conocido, durante el periodo de su mandato, la banda de Lee Myung Bak convirtio lo todo de la sociedad surcoreana en la victima de las fuerzas extranjeras practicando las politicas antipopulares y el despotismo y llevo a la peor fase las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					Los casos de corrupcion, que se revelan sucesivamente, ponen en un aprieto a Lee. 
					
					El traidor Lee esta inquietado y atemorizado por la sentencia de la historia y la nacion por sus crimenes no vistos. 
					
					En esta circunstancia, adula a Park Geun-hye para mantener su vida restante despues de abdicacion del trono. 
					
					A su vez, la camarilla de Park, caprichosa con estrecha vision, tiene la base de las "elecciones generales" y de las "elecciones presidenciales" que se sacude por la campana de renuncia masiva del "Partido Saenuri" de los elementos pro-Lee. 
					
					Es natural que la confabulacion de los criminales genere mayores crimenes y afecte mas a los habitantes. 
					
					He aqui la razon por la cual en la sociedad surcoreana se elevan cada dia mas las voces de denuncia al "Partido Saenuri".

articles.title: ACNC critica concepcion de historia del premier japones
articles.content:
ACNC critica concepcion de historia del premier japones
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- La injusta concepcion de historia del premier japones provoca un gran repudio en la sociedad internacional. 
					El pasado dia 26 dijo en la comision presupuestaria de la camara de consejeros que es erronea la expresion de "esclavas sexuales para el viejo ejercito japones". 
					
					Con tal arrogancia nego el caso de ex consoladoras para el ejercito japones, reconocido por la sociedad internacional como crimen antietico de talla especial, y mostro la postura de Japon contemporaneo en  cuanto a  la reflexion de sus crimenes del pasado. 
					
					El caso de ex consoladoras sexuales es el crimen antietico organizado e institucional cometido por el imperialismo japones en el periodo de la guerra de agresion al continente segun la politica estatal en tiempo de guerra y abusando de la autoridad gubernamental y militar. 
					
					Los imperialistas japoneses secuestraron de manera forzosa a 200 mil mujeres coreanas y les obligaron el "servicio sexual" para sus uniformados y les asesinaron en masas para encubrir sus atrocidades. 
					
					En este mundo Japon es el unico pais que cometio el crimen de esclavitud sexual bajo la organizacion y amparo directivos del gobierno y la capa militar. 
					
					Sin embargo, el pais isleno intenta evadir la responsabilidad estatal describiendo ese crimen de lesa humanidad como "conducta de traficantes de prostitutas". Para este fin tergiversa sin escrupulos que las victimas "lo hicieron voluntariamente para ganar el dinero" y elude la liquidacion del pasado negando su historia criminal. 
					
					La actitud de Japon sobre sus crimenes del pasado es un desafio frontal a la demanda de la sociedad internacional de liquidar la historia criminal y un acto ilegal que abulta su expediente criminal. 
					
					Japon no puede liberarse  nunca  de la responsabilidad de haber insultado a la humanidad. 
					
					Por mas que dilate la liquidacion de su pasado, Japon agrandara mas sus crimenes y caera en apuros en lo politico.

articles.title: Minju Joson refuta rumor de inestabilidad de regimen norcoreano
articles.content:
Minju Joson refuta rumor de inestabilidad de regimen norcoreano
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak difunde tenazmente el rumor de la supuesta "inestabilidad del regimen norcoreano" como parte de su chismografia del "cambio del mismo regimen".
					Son inaceptables para la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, donde los militares y civiles avanzan a pasos firmes unidos compactamente en torno a su Maximo Dirigente, los chismes como "periodo provisional del poder" e "inquietud del regimen", sentencia el rotativo Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado este sabado y prosigue:
					
					La "inestabilidad del regimen" si existe en el Sur de Corea.
					
					En estos instantes tambien, los habitantes surcoreanos de distintos sectores libran una intensa lucha anti-Lee Myung Bak.
					
					Para colmo, cuando son inminentes las elecciones de "asambleistas", se agravan las rinas fraccionalistas dentro de la camarilla de Lee.
					
					Sin embargo, ella muestra esa caricatura politica de difundir el rumor de la "inestabilidad del regimen norcoreano" tergiversando y calumniando la realidad de la RPDC, dignificada en la palestra mundial por su unidad monolitica mas poderosa que el arma nuclear.
					
					Detras de ese rumor esta su siniestra intencion de distraer la mirada de odio de la poblacion al enganar la opinion publica, reparar la crisis de dominacion y recrudecer su campana de enfrentamiento fratricida con la connacional RPDC.
					
					Si se deja intacta a la camarilla de Lee enloquecida por el enfrentamiento entre los regimenes del Norte y el Sur, la nacion coreana sufrira grandes desgracias.
					
					Por eso, todos los compatriotas coinciden en exterminar a esos perros rabiosos que desafian a la voluntad del pueblo.
